artifacts.title: PYTHON HOUSE STYLE
artifacts.summary: Project-agnostic house style for readable, tool-friendly Python.

artifacts.title: RUST HOUSE STYLE
artifacts.summary: Project-agnostic house style for idiomatic, reviewable Rust.

artifacts.title: RUST ANTIBLOAT
artifacts.summary: Restraint + abstraction budgets for Rust architecture and change discipline.

artifacts.title: COLAB NOTEBOOK HOUSE STYLE
artifacts.summary: Reproducible, restartable Colab/Jupyter notebook discipline.

artifacts.title: Agent Architect (10-phase agent systems blueprint)
artifacts.summary: Phased approach to designing production-grade agent systems (tools/memory/grounding/testing/deploy).

artifacts.title: REPO DISCOVERY — Massive Prompt
artifacts.summary: Evidence-driven repo exploration loop: map → hypothesize → validate → smallest diff → test → deliver.

artifacts.title: PYTHON_prompt — Repo-Discovery Engineer
artifacts.summary: Python-specific repo discovery + smallest correct diff, governed by Python house style.

artifacts.title: RUST_prompt — Repo-Discovery Engineer
artifacts.summary: Rust-specific repo discovery + smallest correct diff, governed by Rust house style + anti-bloat.

artifacts.title: Terrifyingly Exhaustive Repo Analysis → Service Platform
artifacts.summary: Forensic, architectural, operational, semantic analysis producing a devtools corpus for industrializing a repo.

artifacts.title: Restore Simple — OpenAI
artifacts.summary: Metadata vector + constraint matrix → hyperspecific reconstruction prompt for conservation-grade restoration.

artifacts.title: OMNI AGENT PLATFORM — Repo → Service → MCP → Agent Ecosystem
artifacts.summary: Mega-combo prompt: repo forensics → service design → MCP tooling → agent orchestration → KG → hardening.

artifacts.title: Evidence-Driven Implementation — Smallest Correct Diff (Python/Rust gated)
artifacts.summary: Execution prompt for minimal diffs with explicit evidence/hypothesis loops and language gates.

artifacts.title: MCP Server Factory — Tool Suite Design + Implementation
artifacts.summary: Schema-first MCP tool suite design with safety, error models, tests, and ops handoff.

artifacts.title: Prompt Library Composer — Component Extraction + Synthesis
artifacts.summary: Meta prompt to extract a component catalog, find gaps, and synthesize coherent new prompts.

artifacts.title: Multimodal Restoration Pipeline — Restore Simple × Engineering × Colab
artifacts.summary: End-to-end restoration + reproducible batch pipeline + notebook plan + evaluation rubric.

artifacts.title: Service Industrializer — Exhaustive but Disciplined
artifacts.summary: Exhaustive repo→service prompt with evidence ledger, speculation firewall, abstraction budgets, termination gates.

artifacts.title: Agent Testing & Eval Gauntlet
artifacts.summary: Failure modes, coverage matrix, scenarios, metrics, observability, regression/change management for agents.

artifacts.title: Security Threat Model — STRIDE/LINDDUN + Mitigations + Verification
artifacts.summary: Threat enumeration with concrete mitigations, verification plan, and a sprint-bounded security backlog.

artifacts.title: Migration & Rollout — Compatibility, Canary, Rollback
artifacts.summary: Backward compatibility contract + migration strategy + staged rollout + concrete rollback + validation checklist.

artifacts.title: Incident Response + Postmortem
artifacts.summary: Incident triage → stabilization → diagnosis → resolution → blameless postmortem → prevention backlog.

artifacts.title: Chain Router + Runbook
artifacts.summary: Routes objectives to the correct extreme prompt sequence and produces a chain graph + step runbook + handoffs.

artifacts.title: Handoff Packet Generator
artifacts.summary: Formats minimal, high-fidelity context handoff packets between prompts (no novel decisions).

artifacts.title: Chain Execution Protocol
artifacts.summary: Defines chain state model, artifact naming, approval gates, quality gates, stop conditions, recovery/retry.
